name: ocrsync
description: Synchronizes with the OverClocked ReMix music repository.

scripts.build:css: cat src/css/index.css | cleancss -O1 specialComments:0 -O2 restructureRules:on > css/index.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.pack: npm run pack:linux && npm run pack:win32
scripts.pack:linux: electron-packager . --platform linux --icon ./assets/icon.png --out ./dist --overwrite; cd ./dist/ocrsync-linux-x64/; zip -FSr -y ../ocrsync-linux-x64.zip *; cd ..; rm -r ocrsync-linux-x64/
scripts.pack:win32: electron-packager . --platform win32 --icon ./assets/icon.ico --out ./dist --win32metadata.CompanyName="C.T.M. Corp." --win32metadata.ProductName="OCRSync" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Synchronizes with the OverClocked ReMix music repository." --overwrite; cd ./dist/; zip -FSr -y ocrsync-win32-x64.zip ocrsync-win32-x64/; rm -r ocrsync-win32-x64/

author: BreadMaker
